title: Why am I sending messages that I've never sent?
body: I just got on League and I got about 5 messages that say its fake. I somehow posted "magic558: omg dude riot is giving mystery gifts for christmas it actually ******* worked [Link removed]". I Swear I did not type this ever. I never gave my password to anyone. Literally no one.  Pls Help

replies.body: If your account shares its password with another service, such as email or any website you've signed up to, there's a chance that a password breach on their side has resulted in someone gaining access to your account. If you haven't already, I strongly encourage you to reset your LoL password and change it to something unique.
